about_the_game:
Learn the story of Veronica, a seemingly average girl who accidentally discovers secrets that are inaccessible to ordinary people in the Five Owls visual novel! Explore the beautiful city of Pińczów, let yourself be carried away by the magic and see how our heroine will handle a completely unexpected role!

Info:

Duration: About 3h.

Languages: English, Polish.

Type: Visual Novel.

Five Owls is a visual novel telling the story of Veronica and her crazy adventure set in the 21st century in the beautiful city of Pińczów in Poland. The girl is a type of gaming loner who doesn't look for trouble - it finds her!

On her way, she unexpectedly meets five fascinating characters - Domarad, Helen, Rosalie, Naoyasu and... Johnny. Veronica doesn't know it yet, but this meeting will change her life forever.

Immerse yourself in a beautiful, hand-drawn world sprinkled with breathtaking music and discover the secret that connects five strangers and a mysterious stone decorated with runes.

Game features:

  • Beautifully drawn characters and backgrounds.

  • Soul-moving music.

  • Deeply immersive story with breathtaking twists.

  • Interesting facts about Pińczów city based on colorful legends.
